task.title: Mass Update Job and Salary Information
task.shortdesc: Employee administrators can quickly process job and salary information changes for multiple employee records at one time by using the Job and Salary work event.

context.p: Before processing job and salary changes via a mass update:

ul.li: Define the type of change (Change Job, Change Salary, or Change Job and Salary) and enter details.
Select the employees that you want to include in the update.

context.p: Important: If you have multiple component companies, you must define a separate mass update for the job and salary information for each component company.

ul.li: From the Add Mass Update page, select the Job and Salary Change from the Actions menu, and then select OK.
